name: TuneIndiaRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Tune India Radio”
”Alexa, open Tune India Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tune india radio
des: Listen to Tune India Radio on Alexa, your gateway to a vibrant world of Bollywood music and Indian radio content. Tune India Radio offers a rich variety of Hindi songs, engaging shows, and the latest news tailored for the Indian diaspora. Enjoy uninterrupted streaming of your favorite tunes and stay connected with the Indian community around the globe, all with a simple voice command. Just ask Alexa to 'Open Tune India Radio' and immerse yourself in the best of Indian entertainment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
